actions.name: AssociateDefaultView
actions.description: Grants permission to set the specified view as the default for this AWS Region in this AWS account

actions.name: BatchGetView
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve details about views that you specify by a list of ARNs

actions.name: CreateIndex
actions.description: Grants permission to turn on Resource Explorer in the AWS Region in which you called this operation by creating an index

actions.name: CreateView
actions.description: Grants permission to create a view that users can query

actions.name: DeleteIndex
actions.description: Grants permission to turn off Resource Explorer in the specified AWS Region by deleting the index

actions.name: DeleteView
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a view

actions.name: DisassociateDefaultView
actions.description: Grants permission to remove the default view for the AWS Region in which you call this operation

actions.name: GetAccountLevelServiceConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to Resource Explorer to access account level data within your AWS Organization

actions.name: GetDefaultView
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the Amazon resource name (ARN) of the view that is the default for the AWS Region in which you call this operation

actions.name: GetIndex
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the index in the AWS Region in which you call this operation

actions.name: GetView
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the specified view

actions.name: ListIndexes
actions.description: Grants permission to list the indexes in all AWS Regions

actions.name: ListIndexesForMembers
actions.description: Grants permission to list the organization member account's indexes in all AWS Regions

actions.name: ListSupportedResourceTypes
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of all resource types currently supported by Resource Explorer

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to list the tags that are attached to the specified resource

actions.name: ListViews
actions.description: Grants permission to list the Amazon resource names (ARNs) of all of the views available in the AWS Region in which you call this operation

actions.name: Search
actions.description: Grants permission to search for resources and display details about all resources that match the specified criteria

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to add one or more tag key and value pairs to the specified resource

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove one or more tag key and value pairs from the specified resource

actions.name: UpdateIndexType
actions.description: Grants permission to change the type of the index from LOCAL to AGGREGATOR or back

actions.name: UpdateView
actions.description: Grants permission to modify some of the details of a view
